plot.topic: Everything you should know about building and running a micro SaaS

chapters.chapter_title: What Micro SaaS Actually Is (and Is Not)
chapters.chapter_summary: Defines micro SaaS as a capital-efficient, narrowly scoped software business optimized for profitability, control, and sustainability rather than venture-scale growth.
chapters.include: bootstrapping vs venture scale, founder leverage, small teams or solo founders, revenue ceilings, control vs speed tradeoffs
chapters.avoid: romanticized indie hacking, overnight success myths, vague entrepreneurship slogans
